title: Johnson Controls identity
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044718im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo_johnson-controls_dian-hasan-branding_US-1_5668.png)

I found a site that referenced the typeface as being Maurea but I disagree with it.  
I suspect this may have been custom created by Lippincott.

Any help would be appreciated!
author: Hoby Albright

comments.content: Brioni Sans + DTL Prokyon + Corisande Bold (Just a wild guess)

Note that T.26 has discontinued Corisande [http://www.t26.com/fonts/Corisande](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044718/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/Corisande "http://www.t26.com/fonts/Corisande")  
Also similar to FF Daxline

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044718im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FFDaxlineAsJohnsonControls_6406.jpg)
  
 [http://www.linotype.com/818977/FFDaxlineStdMedium-product.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044718/http:/www.linotype.com/818977/FFDaxlineStdMedium-product.html "http://www.linotype.com/818977/FFDaxlineStdMedium-product.html")  
Don
